00029 #ifndef __MemoryNedAlloc_H__
00030 #define __MemoryNedAlloc_H__
00031 
00032 #if OGRE_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR == OGRE_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR_NED
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre
00035 {
00044     class _OgreExport NedAllocImpl
00045     {
00046     public:
00047         static void* allocBytes(size_t count, 
00048             const char* file, int line, const char* func);
00049         static void deallocBytes(void* ptr);
00050         static void* allocBytesAligned(size_t align, size_t count, 
00051             const char* file, int line, const char* func);
00052         static void deallocBytesAligned(size_t align, void* ptr);
00053 
00054     };
00055 
00064     class _OgreExport NedAllocPolicy
00065     {
00066     public:
00067         static inline void* allocateBytes(size_t count, 
00068             const char* file = 0, int line = 0, const char* func = 0)
00069         {
00070             return NedAllocImpl::allocBytes(count, file, line, func);
00071         }
00072         static inline void deallocateBytes(void* ptr)
00073         {
00074             NedAllocImpl::deallocBytes(ptr);
00075         }
00077         static inline size_t getMaxAllocationSize()
00078         {
00079             return std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max();
00080         }
00081     private:
00082         // No instantiation
00083         NedAllocPolicy()
00084         { }
00085     };
00086 
00087 
00100     template <size_t Alignment = 0>
00101     class NedAlignedAllocPolicy
00102     {
00103     public:
00104         // compile-time check alignment is available.
00105         typedef int IsValidAlignment
00106             [Alignment <= 128 && ((Alignment & (Alignment-1)) == 0) ? +1 : -1];
00107 
00108         static inline void* allocateBytes(size_t count, 
00109             const char* file = 0, int line = 0, const char* func = 0)
00110         {
00111             return NedAllocImpl::allocBytesAligned(Alignment, count, file, line, func);
00112         }
00113 
00114         static inline void deallocateBytes(void* ptr)
00115         {
00116             NedAllocImpl::deallocBytesAligned(Alignment, ptr);
00117         }
00118 
00120         static inline size_t getMaxAllocationSize()
00121         {
00122             return std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max();
00123         }
00124     private:
00125         // no instantiation allowed
00126         NedAlignedAllocPolicy()
00127         { }
00128     };
00129 
00130 
00131 
00135 }// namespace Ogre

00137 #endif
